CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials .

Let's think step by step.

1. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)
2. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
3. Polymer (implied material, but not explicitly stated as a Material Name, so it's not included in the list)
4. V OC (Open Circuit Voltage)
5. NIR (Near-Infrared)
6. Lower bandgap materials (implied materials, but not explicitly stated as Material Names, so they're not included in the list)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer |
| Lower bandgap materials |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials .

Let's think step by step.

1. LUMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
2. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
3. VOC (Volatile Organic Compound)
4. bandgap (energy difference between the HOMO and LUMO levels)
5. NIR (Near-Infrared)
6. materials (polymer materials)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| bandgap |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| polymer materials |

PV.content:

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials .

Let's think step by step.

1. LUMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) level
2. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) level
3. VOC (Volatile Organic Compound)
4. Bandgap (implied by "lower bandgap materials")

These entities are properties or characteristics of the polymer that can be modified to achieve specific outcomes.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. LUMO level
2. HOMO level
3. VOC (Volatile Organic Compound)
4. Bandgap

These entities are the only ones in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties with specific values.
